Events that occurred on 18 February.

content.title: On Earth
content.content:
1857 - Arthur Tolkien is born on Handsworth, Staffordshire, England.
1937 - J.R.R. Tolkien's poem "Knocking at the Door" is published in The Oxford Magazine.
1938 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes Letter 24.
1944 - Narrator Anthony Jackson is born.
1991 â€“ The final day of the first "Colloquium on the Languages of Middle-earth" at the house of E.L.F. member Bill Welden.

content.title: In Arda
content.content:
T.A. 3019:
The Fellowship of the Ring travels south down the Anduin. Gollum follows them on a log.
